Name: Blaauwhooft
Review Text: Loved this place... Had a drink here every evening during my 10 days in Amsterdam. The food was really delicious and the staff super friendly. Reminded me of a local pub kind of place, everyone seemed to know everyone else.

Name: Blaauwhooft

Name: Blaauwhooft

Name: Blaauwhooft
Review Text: This place had a lot of heart. The steak was a little dry. I was happy to see how clean everything was. The service was good for the most part but the waitress was a bit air-headed. The decor was unique and incredible. Satisfactory experience, will come again.

Name: Blaauwhooft
Review Text: A great neighbourhood bar/restaurant. We discovered this place on our last night - great food, very good service, and a nice neighbourhood feel. We ate snails, a smoked fish salad, and the (famous) cheese fondue and all were delicious. ‚Ä¶

Name: Blaauwhooft
Review Text:
Great stylish Amsterdam Restaurant... We had  a wonderful salmon and a great medium Ribeye... very friendly service...
It is not fast food, which means that if it is busy you could wait a little for your dinner (about 30 min), but this was O.K. for us - we really had a good time...
